14.content:
After eating breakfast she decided to go on a walk. She changes into a blue crop top and jeans then fill up a water bottle and leave her house.

During her walk she come across a lake full of murky water and saw large fish swimming in it. Wow those are massive there like the size of full grown adult human Lisa through to herself. She walk towards the lake to get a closer look at the huge fish.

Once the edge of the lake “yeah these fish are huge” she said to herself, then a gust of wind pushed Lisa into the water, the large fish turn around and swam towards her quickly. I got to get out of here she thought as she swam towards the shore line.

The fish were getting closer and closer to Lisa feet, ou one the fish bite her on to her left legs right as she leaves the water. The large was flapping back on her leg. Lisa grabs a branch next to her a hit off the fish.
Oh this is bad, really bad her leg was gushing blood, she takes of her crop top reveling her B cup bra and rap her top around her leg to stop from bleeding. “I got to get the hospital” said Lisa, she calls 911 and requested an ambulance to pick her up.

The ambulance arrives two people rush over to Lisa on the ground struggling to stay alive. “Hurry get in the van and inject on IV in her arm”the nurse says.

They arrived at the emergency room entrance and wheel in the room ,three doctor come in to examined her left leg.

141.content:
The doctor put Lisa in an anesthesia state. The doctor removed the top form her leg to see the bite wounds, but what they saw was that wounds were regenerating healing the bite wounds, the doctor were shocked. “Well what should we do doctor “ask the assistant doctors, “well we could just put a bandage around her left leg and say that we stitch up her leg and then send her home “said the head doctor .

30 minutes later once Lisa woke up they told her you’re free to go. So she was drove home by Uber.
Lisa wonder why those fish were so big so she drove back to lake and walk around it ,but a safe distance from the water line. She noticed some barrels with an unknown liquid poring in the lake waters. She get out of her car to take an closer look at the barrel.

She bunt down looking at all side of the barrel but only two words that she could read were growth hormone that were faded. So that why the fish are so large wait that means I will grow to I hope not she though.
Then she drove back home to continue her watch tv.
